item.title: nexus-operator
item.description:
Description

A Helm chart for KubeRocketCI Nexus Operator

  • https://github.com/epam/edp-nexus-operator

Overview

Identity Namespace Automount Secrets Permissions Workloads Risk
edp-nexus-operator default ❌ — 1 1 Low

Numbers in the last two columns indicate how many bindings or workloads involve each ServiceAccount.

Identities

🤖 edp-nexus-operator

Namespace: default  |  Automount: ❌

🔑 Permissions (1)

Role Resource Verbs Risk Tags
ClusterRole edp-nexus-operator-default admissionregistration.k8s.io/validatingwebhookconfigurations get · patch · update Low

⚠️ Potential Abuse (1)
